notes.text:
This security update of gnutls fixes the following issues:

- use minimal padding for CBC, the default random length padding
  causes problems with some servers (bsc#925499)
  * added gnutls-use_minimal_cbc_padding.patch
- use the default DH minimum for gnutls-cli instead of hardcoding 512
  * CVE-2015-4000 (Logjam) (bsc#932026)
  * added gnutls-CVE-2015-4000-logjam-use_the_default_DH_min_for_cli.patch
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The TLS protocol 1.2 and earlier, when a DHE_EXPORT ciphersuite is enabled on a server but not on a client, does not properly convey a DHE_EXPORT choice, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct cipher-downgrade attacks by rewriting a ClientHello with DHE replaced by DHE_EXPORT and then rewriting a ServerHello with DHE_EXPORT replaced by DHE, aka the "Logjam" issue.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
